name: Crispy Roasted Pumpkin Seeds
author: Woody
summary: If you like your pumpkin seeds crispy, you will love these. The amount of seeds and the amount of seasonings can vary. Just be sure to keep stirring every 10 minutes for at least an hour. I used the convection roast setting on my oven.
ingredients: 1 pinch garlic powder, or to taste
directions: Clean seeds from pulp in cold water
Soak seeds in warm water with kosher salt for 30 minutes
While seeds soak, preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Drain seeds and dry off a little with a cloth or paper towels
Spread out on a baking sheet and sprinkle with sea salt and garlic powder
Bake in the center of the preheated oven, stirring and shaking the pan every 10 minutes, until light brown and crispy, about 1 hour
